title: Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus by Nabeel Qureshi [ePub/mobi]
description:
An Unexpected Journey from Islam to Christianity

In Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus, Nabeel Qureshi describes his dramatic journey from Islam to Christianity, complete with friendships, investigations, and supernatural dreams along the way.


Providing an intimate window into a loving Muslim home, Qureshi shares how he developed a passion for Islam before discovering, almost against his will, evidence that Jesus rose from the dead and claimed to be God. Unable to deny the arguments but not wanting to deny his family, QureshiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s inner turmoil will challenge Christians and Muslims alike.

About the Author

Nabeel Qureshi is a speaker with Ravi Zacharias International Ministries. He holds an MD from Eastern Virginia Medical School, an MA in Christian apologetics from Biola University, and an MA in religion from Duke University.


Print Length: 328 pages
ISBN: 0310515025
Publisher: Zondervan (February 11, 2014)
